properties.title: Zyberliland Romoos
properties.abstract: Zyberliland Romoos is world of discovery, play, adventure and fun. Climbing, sliding, splashing or crawling, there's so much to do for the young – and the young at heart!
properties.description:
It's packed with wonderful activities such as the Talherrenburg and the Nüüteli-Mine, and there are delicious zyberli (wild plum) products for visitors to savour.

The Zyberliland world of adventure revolves around three fabulous children's books – Zyberli-Gschicht, Bärgmandli-Wiehnacht im Zyberliland and Frouestimmrächt und vöu Wind im Zyberliland – and everyone's invited to join in the storytelling fun.

The Zyberliland is an adventure playground focused on nature, with play areas linked by a footpath known as the Bärgmandlitritt.
properties.name: Zyberiland Romoos
